room.name: Testland, Bonfire Land
room.desc: There's lots of scenery here, varied and wild. But none of that matters because there's a huge bonfire which draws all attention!
room.focus: You don't know why, but you feel like whooping.

room.name: Testland, Ice Cavern
room.desc: It's cold, and its windy, which adds to the wind chill factor. The wind seems to be coming from the northwest.

room.name: Testland, Wind Tunnel
room.desc: You suddenly find yourself next to a huge vortex of wind and leaves!

room.name: Testland, Ancient Oak Tree
room.desc: A grand, ancient oak tree stands here, as it has done for centuries.
room.focus: Its big. Very big. Oh, and at the base of the tree you see a bronze door that leads inside (try OPEN ENTER!).

room.name: Testland, Inside Oak, Foyer
room.desc: The great tree is hollowed out, and the inside reveals that many generations of elves have lived here, making cookies for children everywhere. There also appears be a great bronze door.
room.focus: It probably leads outside, if you LEAVE, assuming its open

room.name: Testland, Inside Oak, Armory
room.desc: An array of weapons and other utensils of death make their home here. If you had to guess, you would think that this is the demo room for the developers to test combat.

room.name: Testland, Inside Oak, Training Room
room.desc: The walls in this room are padded, and slightly bloodstained. There appears to be a bucket filled with blood, sinew and teeth, and the remnants of someone's attempt at repairing a broken limb. All this proves quite impressive for the top of an oak tree.

item.name: a puffy blue polo shirt
item.short: A puffy blue polo shirt is here.
item.desc: The shirt looks only slightly worn and exceedingly puffy, but otherwise is in good condition.

item.name: a gleaming longsword
item.desc: The longsword gleams from a fresh polish.

item.name: Occam's razor
item.desc: You think it may be an axiom that governs the chances of a complex theory over a simpler one, but its probably just a good weapon for giving an adversary an extremely close shave.

item.name: a wooden spear
item.desc: A simple wooden spear with a pointed tip. Not much for ornamentation but certainly enough to skewer an adversary at quite a distance.

item.name: an ordinary claymore
item.desc: The claymore is ordinary, but massive. Taking too many strikes from this will hurt something fierce.

item.name: a simple longbow
item.desc: The longbow is created out of a non-specific wood, and is tied together rather plainly.

item.name: a crudely fashioned arrow
item.short: a crudely fashioned arrow lies here
item.short_multiple: some crudely fashioned arrows lie here

denizen.name: the killer penguin
denizen.short: A killer penguin roams about, looking for its next victim.
denizen.desc: The penguin is roaming about, looking for attention from wherever it may come. He also appears hungry, perhaps for a foot or an arm.
